version_description:
You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

- Fixed an uncommon bug that would prevent users from logging in until they reinstalled the app

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

- Changing text color now works when a line is selected
- Fixed an uncommon bug that would prevent users from logging in until they reinstalled the app

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

- Added Apple Pencil support for our iPad Pro users
- Added keyboard shortcuts for users with external keyboards â€“ hold the "Command" key on your external keyboard to see a list of supported shortcuts
- Added support for custom shapes and shape libraries, and added support for managing individual shape libraries and entire categories of shapes

- Receive rich Push Notifications for shared documents and folders within your team. Enable in View My Account > Manage Notifications.
- Open recent diagrams and create documents quickly with 2 new widgets (new for iOS 10!)
- A new Messages sticker pack with fun flowchart emoji (for iOS 10).

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

This release is full of bug fixes and polish. Enjoy!

- You can now log in with your passwords saved in Safari Keychain.
- We no longer log you out every 30 days (if your password hasn't changed).
- Improved text edit mode when using hardware keyboards, more improvements coming soon!
- When you try to close a document with unsaved changes, we now warn you to prevent accidental loss.
- Improved look and behavior of loading spinners throughout the app.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Improved exporting and sharing!

- New: Export PDF/PNG/Visio from the documents list! Select a document and tap the share button to access the export and share dialog.
- There is now an explicit share button in the editor which takes you to the export and share dialog. Tapping the document title used to show exporting and sharing options, but now simply lets you rename the document.
- Pending invitations in the collaborator dialog now include a share button so you can re-send the invitation.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Introducing recurring subscriptions! You can now subscribe to Lucidchart Basic and Lucidchart Professional on a month-to-month basis, unlocking all the same great features as before. Plus, your subscription will renew automatically (with the ability to cancel anytime) so no need to worry about it expiring. If you are currently on the six-month plan and would like to move to a month-to-month subscription, please email support@lucidchart.com.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Introducing Commenting!
- You can now add comments to shapes (viewable by document collaborators).
- Receive and reply to comments in real-time when editing a document.
- Tap the comment icon next to a shape or in the bottom toolbar to access commenting.
- More commenting updates coming!

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Bug fixes and improvements for team and enterprise users.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Improved commenting capabilities. You can now resolve and reopen comments, plus filter comments by those that are active, resolved, and mine.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

We've been working hard to make your diagramming experience better!
- Upload photos from your camera or photo library
- Enter full screen mode to view your diagram without distractions
- Long hold or tap shapes to easily access copy, paste, reorder, select all, and more
- Two-finger tap on the canvas to undo, three-finger tap to redo
- Experience a newly designed document list and shape picker
- Plus, enjoy lots of bug fixes

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Sharing your documents has never been easier! We've improved the design and you can now share documents with your contacts. Try it out! Plus, enjoy bug fixes and a faster app launch.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We've got an awesome update for you!

iOS 11 drag and drop support:
- Drop images and text into your diagram
- Drag and drop folders or documents to move them
- Drop files into your documents list to import them

A newly designed documents list navigation:
- Switch between views with the new tabs along the bottom
- Easily navigate in and out of folders

You can now @mention people when commenting on shapes and edit your previous comments.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Introducing an optimized editor for iPad! See all your styling options at once and quickly switch between adding shapes, styling, and commenting.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

You can now add and edit org charts in your diagrams! Check out the new org chart functionality under the "options" section of the styles panel.

You can always reach us at support@lucidchart.com with feedback, questions, or issues (you can also tap "Get Support" or "Send Feedback" in the app). Thanks for being a Lucidchart customer!

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Based on your requests, we're introducing offline editing! When your device goes offline, your changes will save to your device until you reconnect.
